book.title: American Gods
book.author: Neil Gaiman
book.description: People from various countries came to America, and they all brought their gods with them - the gods of evil and good, cunning and strong. Each of the gods has its own goals and desires. But all these gods needed and still need people, human faith. The world of gods and the world of people are intertwined more and more closely. Communication with the gods can destroy or help the heroes find themselves and gain unprecedented powers.
